Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: giant cell tumor of the bone that cannot be removed by surgery. It is used in adults and in adolescents whose bones have finished growing

hypercalcemia of malignancy that got worse after treatment with bisphosphonates
These uses are approved for the Xgeva brand of denosumab.
broken bones and other bone problems caused by multiple myeloma or by solid tumors that have spread to bone. This use is approved for the Xgeva brand of denosumab

Section.Para: Denosumab is also approved to increase bone mass in adults who have a high risk of breaking bones. It is used in the following types of cancer:

ItemizedList.ListItem: breast cancer in women receiving aromatase inhibitor therapy

prostate cancer in men receiving androgen deprivation therapy
These uses are approved for the Prolia brand of denosumab.

Section.Para: Denosumab is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions and types of cancer.
